page.title: 09Rodmore Farm
page.content: Mr James does not know how old Rodmore Farm is.It has {170 acres}.20 acres they use for crops and 28 acres they use for grazing.They are growing wheat at the moment.The fields are on big slopes.The cows produce {17 to 18 {litres of milk a day.}They have got one new born calf and a lot of heifers also.The farm used to belong to{Clanna {Estate.}The house wasn't in good condition before Mr James came so he did it up.They have been living there for 17 years.The house is very big.It has about ten rooms.They haven't got an orchard.The trees around them are mostly coniferous.But there are some deciduous in the area.They haven't got any chickens.They have got workers to help them.
